metadata.name: theF初irst夢Ni夜模擬ght.exe
metadata.description:
As the Chinese New Year of 2023 approaches, I have been busy creating my first piece of the year. 
My mind raced back to the summer night of 2021 when I was a third-year university student feeling lost about my future. During an aimless internet browsing session, I stumbled upon digital art and NFTs, which changed my life forever. That was a miraculous night that introduced me to the world of 3D creation and I created the first LuckyCat artwork(https://rarible.com/token/0x6988feca5ec2b998935a50ca72c3e26016b8b20f:5?tab=overview), representing my hopes and aspirations.

As I continued to grow and improve in my craft, I have made many friends and gained a lot of support along the way. Looking back, that night was probably one of the best in my life. 
I reflect on my journey as an artist and realize that it's time for me to break out of my comfort zone(collectibles) and explore new avenues to express my experiences and emotions.

So let the simulation begin...

Size: 2560x1440 pixels 
Format: mp4  
Music: Error_Hazzy 

2023年的中国新年，我在创作今年的第一个作品。  
我的大脑飞速运转，模拟起2021年的一个夏夜，时值大三的我对未来十分迷茫，在漫无目的的互联网浏览中了解到了数字艺术与NFT。  
那是一个改变我一生的奇迹夜晚，那也是一只改变了我一生的奇迹虚拟招财猫。我开始学习3D创作，用稚嫩的手法创作代表了我的希望和未来的第一个LuckyCot收藏品系列...  (https://rarible.com/token/0x6988feca5ec2b998935a50ca72c3e26016b8b20f:5?tab=overview )  
我在创作的过程中进步和成长，从一开始只能建最简单的模型，到后来可以随心所欲地创作心中所想，而这一路我也收获很多朋友和支持。  
所以回想起来，那应该是我一生中最棒的一个夜晚了吧？  
时间回到2023年，我想我不应该把我的作品形式局限在Colletible收藏品，我是时候突破一下自己的舒适区，去尝试更多东西，去表达我的体会和情感....

那么，就让模拟开始吧...

Size: 2560x1440 pixels 
Format: mp4  
Music: Error_Hazzy
